sentences.sContent: DIYing has given a major shot in the arm to the crafting industry, which covers scrapbooking, traditional needlework as well as hobbies like woodworking.
sentences.sContent_eng: DIYing has given a major shot in the arm to the crafting industry, which covers scrapbooking, traditional needlework as well as hobbies like woodworking.
sentences.sCn: DIY给手工艺界带来重大冲击，这个行业涵盖剪贴薄制作、传统的缝纫工作以及一些业余爱好，例如木工手艺等。

phrases.pCn: 木工机床，木工机器；木材加工机械

trans.tranOther: of, relating to, or used in woodworking
